body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Great Marsh                Great Marsh        Dennis Gray, NPS Collection       Facility Hours Open Daily: Sunrise - 30 minutes past sunset  Parking for cars Paved wheelchair-accessible trail to overlook  Street Address / Road Intersection 500 South Broadway Beverly Shores, IN 46301 GPS Coordinates 41.674756N 86.986786W       Trails Great Marsh Trail         Click image to view full trail map.        Visitor Activities  Year-round hiking trail Birding trail Hike to the Great Marsh overlook
title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Great Marsh
